name: Minimalist Trousers
description: Impeccably tailored trousers with a modern straight-leg silhouette. Made from innovative recycled wool blend that maintains structure while offering comfort. Features precise pleating and a flattering high-waist design.
short_description: Modern straight-leg trousers in sustainable recycled wool blend.
care_instructions: Dry clean recommended, gentle machine wash cold
sustainability_notes: Made from post-consumer recycled wool. Saves 70% water compared to virgin wool.
meta_description: Shop our minimalist trousers made from recycled wool. Perfect tailoring meets sustainable fashion.

name: Essential Silk Blouse
description: Timeless silk blouse with clean lines and subtle draping. Made from peace silk (ahimsa silk) that is cruelty-free and biodegradable. Features mother-of-pearl buttons and French seams for durability.
short_description: Elegant silk blouse in cruelty-free peace silk with timeless design.
care_instructions: Hand wash or gentle machine wash cold, hang dry, steam iron
sustainability_notes: Made from cruelty-free peace silk. Biodegradable and renewable resource.
meta_title: Essential Silk Blouse - Cruelty-Free Luxury | Athena
meta_description: Shop our essential silk blouse made from cruelty-free peace silk. Timeless elegance with ethical luxury.

name: Structured Midi Skirt
description: A perfectly structured A-line midi skirt with subtle pleating and a flattering high waist. Made from innovative hemp-cotton blend that gets softer with each wear. Features hidden side zip and internal waist stay.
short_description: A-line midi skirt in sustainable hemp-cotton blend with structured design.
care_instructions: Machine wash cold, hang dry, iron medium heat
sustainability_notes: Hemp requires 50% less water than cotton and improves soil health.
meta_title: Structured Midi Skirt - Sustainable Hemp Fashion | Athena
meta_description: Discover our structured midi skirt in sustainable hemp-cotton blend. Classic silhouette meets eco-innovation.

name: Signature Wrap Dress
description: Our most versatile piece - a wrap dress that transitions effortlessly from day to night. Made from innovative Lyocell-silk blend with a fluid drape and flattering silhouette. Features three-quarter sleeves and midi length.
short_description: Versatile wrap dress in Lyocell-silk blend with fluid drape and midi length.
care_instructions: Hand wash cold or gentle machine wash, hang dry, steam iron
sustainability_notes: Lyocell from sustainably managed forests. Peace silk is cruelty-free.
meta_title: Signature Wrap Dress - Versatile Sustainable Fashion | Athena
meta_description: Discover our signature wrap dress in Lyocell-silk blend. Versatile elegance meets sustainable luxury.

name: Essential Tank Top
description: The perfect layering piece made from ultra-soft organic cotton jersey. Features a classic scoop neckline and relaxed fit that works under blazers or on its own. Pre-shrunk and designed to maintain shape wash after wash.
short_description: Classic tank top in soft organic cotton jersey, perfect for layering.
care_instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low or hang dry
sustainability_notes: Made from GOTS-certified organic cotton. Supports regenerative farming practices.
meta_title: Essential Tank Top - Organic Cotton Basics | Athena
meta_description: Shop our essential tank top in organic cotton. Perfect layering piece meets sustainable basics.

name: Essential White Blazer
description: The perfect white blazer that transitions seamlessly from boardroom to brunch. Cut from premium TENCEL Lyocell with a structured shoulder and tailored waist. This versatile piece is designed to be your wardrobe workhorse for years to come.
short_description: Classic white blazer in sustainable TENCEL Lyocell with structured tailoring.
care_instructions: Dry clean only for best results, or gentle machine wash cold
sustainability_notes: TENCEL Lyocell is made from sustainably sourced eucalyptus. Fully biodegradable.
meta_title: Essential White Blazer - Sustainable Professional Wear | Athena
meta_description: Discover the perfect white blazer made from sustainable TENCEL Lyocell. Professional elegance meets eco-luxury.

name: Architectural Midi Dress
description: A masterpiece of minimalist design, this midi dress features clean architectural lines and a structured silhouette. Crafted from certified organic cotton with a subtle drape that flatters every figure. The dress embodies our commitment to timeless elegance and sustainable luxury.
short_description: Minimalist midi dress with architectural lines and sustainable organic cotton construction.
care_instructions: Machine wash cold, hang dry, iron on medium heat
sustainability_notes: Made from GOTS-certified organic cotton. Zero-waste pattern cutting reduces fabric waste by 40%.
meta_title: Architectural Midi Dress - Sustainable Luxury Fashion | Athena
meta_description: Shop our signature architectural midi dress made from certified organic cotton. Timeless design meets sustainable luxury.

name: Wide-Leg Culottes
description: Flowing wide-leg culottes with a sophisticated drape and comfortable elastic waistband. Made from innovative TENCEL Modal that feels like silk but washes like cotton. Perfect for both office and weekend wear.
short_description: Flowing wide-leg culottes in sustainable TENCEL Modal with elegant drape.
care_instructions: Machine wash cold, hang dry, steam iron if needed
sustainability_notes: TENCEL Modal made from sustainably sourced beech trees. 95% less water than cotton.
meta_description: Discover our wide-leg culottes in sustainable TENCEL Modal. Comfortable elegance meets eco-innovation.

name: Minimalist Cashmere Sweater
description: Ultra-soft cashmere sweater with a relaxed fit and clean lines. Made from responsibly sourced cashmere with full traceability to the source. Features ribbed cuffs and hem with a slightly oversized silhouette.
short_description: Relaxed cashmere sweater in responsibly sourced, traceable cashmere.
care_instructions: Hand wash cold or dry clean, lay flat to dry
sustainability_notes: Sourced from farms practicing regenerative grazing. Full supply chain transparency.
production_method: Traditional knitting techniques by skilled artisans
meta_title: Minimalist Cashmere Sweater - Responsible Luxury | Athena
meta_description: Shop our minimalist cashmere sweater made from responsibly sourced cashmere. Luxury comfort meets ethical sourcing.

name: Architectural Coat
description: A statement coat that embodies architectural precision. Features clean geometric lines, structured shoulders, and a dramatic silhouette. Crafted from innovative recycled cashmere blend for ultimate luxury and sustainability.
short_description: Structured coat with architectural design in sustainable recycled cashmere.
sustainability_notes: Made from post-consumer recycled cashmere. Saves 90% water vs. virgin cashmere production.
meta_title: Architectural Coat - Luxury Sustainable Outerwear | Athena
meta_description: Discover our architectural coat in recycled cashmere. Statement outerwear meets sustainable luxury.
